materials.title: White Paint
materials.details: FolkArt Multi-Surface Acrylic • Titanium White • 8 oz

materials.title: Outdoor Medium
materials.details: FolkArt Outdoor Sealer • 1:1 mix ratio for first coat

materials.title: Canvas
materials.details: Black canvas • Primed with outdoor primer

materials.title: Varnish
materials.details: FolkArt Clear Outdoor Varnish • Final protection

process.title: Surface Prep
details: Clean black canvas with mild soap/distilled water
Apply 2 coats of FolkArt Outdoor White Primer (4hrs between)

process.title: Mix Paint
details: For first coat: 1 part White paint : 1 part Outdoor Medium
For additional coats: Use undiluted FolkArt Multi-Surface White
Stir thoroughly but gently to avoid bubbles

process.title: Apply Paint
details: Use synthetic brushes (1" flat for fill, 1/4" round for detail)
Apply 3-4 thin coats (2hrs between in warm weather)
Sand very lightly with 400-grit between final coats

process.title: Seal Surface
details: Apply 3 thin coats of FolkArt Outdoor Matte Sealer (4hrs between)
Top with FolkArt Clear Outdoor Varnish after 24hrs
Allow 7 days full cure before outdoor exposure

techniques.title: Brush Selection
techniques.detail: Synthetic bristle brushes prevent water absorption. Use flat brushes for coverage and round for detail. Clean immediately with warm soapy water.

techniques.title: Stenciling
techniques.detail: Secure with UV-resistant outdoor painter's tape. Apply paint with a dabbing motion. Remove tape while paint is still slightly wet to prevent peeling.

techniques.title: Layering
techniques.detail: Multiple thin coats provide better durability than one thick coat. Apply in cross-direction (first horizontal, then vertical) for even coverage on black canvas.

techniques.title: Edge Treatment
techniques.detail: Extend paint and sealer 1/4" over canvas edges for complete weather protection. Seal all exposed areas including back if fully outdoor exposed.

maintenance: Inspect quarterly for the first year, then bi-annually
Clean gently with soft brush and mild soap solution
Avoid pressure washing or abrasive cleaners
Apply touch-up paint and additional sealer coat annually
Store indoors or cover during extreme weather if possible
